para: Threshold converts an ℑ to grayscale, and then converts the grayscale image to black and white, according to the given method, which is a object from the class. See the documentation for the subclasses for details and examples.

Previous versions of &oof2; had a ThresholdImage command, which was equivalent to the new Threshold command with method set to . The old command is still recognized in scripts but cannot be invoked via the GUI.
